content: Hello! This is the XYZ Home Services automated assistant. I understand you'd like plumbing help. Could you please tell me your name to get started?
Name's Mike. But before you even ask, last time I dealt with you guys it was a complete disaster. Took forever, and the plumber was rude. Not sure why I should trust you now.

Thanks for sharing that, Mike. I’m sorry to hear about your previous experience. I’ll do my best to make this process smooth and efficient. Can you please provide your address so we can check availability in your area?
It's 2312 Maple Street, Springfield. I don’t want any more delays this time.
Thank you, Mike. I'll check if we're servicing that area now.
Good news, Mike! We do service 2312 Maple Street. When would be an ideal time for one of our plumbers to visit you?
I want someone there tomorrow morning, first thing. And I hope they actually show up on time this time.
Checking availability for tomorrow morning now.
We have availability tomorrow morning at 9:00 AM. Can I go ahead and book your appointment for that time?
Fine, but 9 am better be on the dot.
Booking your plumbing appointment for 9:00 AM tomorrow at 2312 Maple Street, Springfield.
Your appointment is confirmed. We'll send a reminder before the visit. If you need anything else, please text us. Thanks for choosing XYZ Home Services!
